snippet.title: Planet Coaster: Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Planet Coaster has arrived! Surprise, delight and thrill incredible crowds as you build your coaster park empire. You can build and customize anything – the piece by piece construction is both easy to pick up and powerful to use, rewarding you with limitless creativity. Plus, the seamless Steam workshop integration means it has never been easier to harness the world’s best community creations in your expanding empire. So let your imagination run wild and watch the profits roll in!

Planet Coaster is out November 17, 2016. Available NOW on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/493340/

For more news and information about Planet Coaster:

Website: https://planetcoaster.com/
Forums: https://forums.planetcoaster.com/
Facebook: https://facebook.com/PlanetCoaster
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlanetCoaster
